name: Happy Cac
description:
Help our friend Wiggly Loaf hop over each prickly pointy cactus to avoid the dangerous thistles and thorns. If you collect sunshine, you will glow like magic and thorns will no longer harm you! Hearts will attract sunshine to you. Yeah it gets a little crazy. Capture hearts, attract sunshine, and while you glow with all that sunshiny goodness ~ SMASH THROUGH THE CACs!

How To Play Happy Cac: Tap the space bar on your keyboard, (or tap using your mouse) to make Wiggly Loaf hop. You get a point for every cactus you collect. Trade in points to unlock and play as other crazy characters.
